data.name: Photo & Graphic Designer 16 Steam Edition
data.detailed_description:
With Photo & Graphic Designer 16 you can transform your photos into real works of art and easily create vector graphics and illustrations.

Graphic design

Give your vision a color and shape – create impressive compositions with Photo & Graphic Designer.
  • Vector-based graphic design for creating your own designs
  • Photo grids for collages
  • SmartShapes (for timelines, diagrams, shapes such as circles, stars, etc.)
  • Create art brushes from vectors and photos
  • NEW! PDF Editor 3.0

Image editing

From snapshots to photo art – Photo & Graphic Designer offers a complete kit of image editing tools.
  • Experiment with colors and effects (brightness, contrast, saturation etc.)
  • Magnetic lasso: Cut out objects with ease
  • Magic Erase: Easily remove unwanted elements from a composition
  • Photo heal tool: Easily retouch photos
  • Drag & drop 140+ photo filters

Illustration

Tell a story through images – create your own logos, symbols & sketches with Photo & Graphic Designer.
  • Art Brush: Photo-realistic brush patterns using scans, photos and vectors.
  • Effects such as transparency, shadows and gradients
  • 3D design – set perspective, depth and shadow
  • CMYK (cyan, magenta, yellow and key) support
  • NEW! OpenType ligatures
  • NEW!Text field filler
  • NEW!Uppercase and lowercase tool
  • NEW!Page makeup

Additional new features

  • Magic Color Match
  • PDF Editor 3.0
  • Improved SmartShapes tables
  • CSV import

data.short_description: Reinvent reality. With Photo & Graphic Designer you have all the options you need to implement your creative vision. Graphic design, image editing and illustration — you'll find it all here, in one program.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista | 7 | 8 | 8.1 | 10
  • Processor: 700 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard, minimum resolution 1280 x 600
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported formats Import: Graphics: JPG, GIF, TIF, BMP, PSD, PDF, EPS, AI, XAR, WEB, XPE, CDR, CDT, CMX, DRW, SVG, EMF, WMF etc. Plus: DOCX, HTM, HTML, RTF. Export: Graphics: JPG, GIF, TIF, BMP, PNG, PSD, PDF, EPS, AI, XAR, WEB, XPE, CMX, DCX, SVG, EMF, WMF etc. Video: SWF, AVI, (animated) GIF. Plus: DOCX, HTM, HTML, RTF
